items.title: Godrej Properties shares in focus on acquiring 10 acres land in Bengaluru
items.description: Godrej Properties Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 3,400.00 and a 52-week low of Rs 1,903.85 on 26 September, 2024 and 28 February, 2025, respectively.

items.title: Welspun Corp shares in focus on voluntary delisting from Calcutta Stock Exchange, selling stake in subsidiary
items.description: Welspun Corp Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 892.25 and a 52-week low of Rs 441.00 on 21 March, 2025 and 04 June, 2024, respectively.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a positive start; US markets gain, Asia mixed
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street edged higher and the dollar gained ground on Friday after US President Donald Trump hinted he would be flexible regarding a new round of tariffs expected to be imposed early next month.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The Foreign institutional investors (FIIs) extended their buying on second day on March 21 as they bought equities worth Rs 7,470 crore, while Domestic institutional investors (DIIs) also extended their selling on second day as they sold equities of Rs 3,202.26 crore, on the same day.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Mazagon Dock, Waaree Energies, Glenmark Pharma, Quess Corp, HPCL, and others on March 24?
items.description: The market is expected to continue its northward journey. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Welspun Corp, NCC, Mahindra and Mahindra, Dr Reddys, Alembic Pharma, Godrej Properties, DAM Capital in focus on 24 March
items.description: Stocks to Watch, Mar 24: Stocks like Reliance Industries, Apollo Hospitals Enterprise, Power Grid Corporation, Allied Blenders and Distillers, Sundaram-Clayton, IRCON International, NMDC, Power Finance Corporation, UCO Bank, Larsen & Toubro, Insolation Energy, Hindustan Copper, IFCI, and IIFL Capital Services will be in focus on March 24.

items.title: Top gainers and losers today: Stocks that moved the most on March 24
items.description: Among the top gainers were Kotak Mahindra Bank, NTPC, SBI, Power Grid Corp, and Bajaj Finserv. On the flip side, M&M, Titan Company, IndusInd Bank, Zomato, and Infosys ended as the day's biggest laggards.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty hits 23,700, turns positive for 2025; Sensex gains 1,079 points
items.description: Biggest Nifty gainers included Kotak Mahindra Bank, NTPC, SBI, Power Grid Corp, Tech Mahindra, while losers were M&M, Titan Company, IndusInd Bank, Trent, Bharti Airtel.

items.title: Live: Nifty Turns Positive For 2025 Amid Solid 300-Point Surge On Marvellous Monday| Closing Bell
items.description: Markets clock 6th straight day of rally. Nifty rallies over 1,300 points in the last 6 sessions. Nifty, Sensex turn positive for 2025. Magical Monday - Nifty zooms past 100-DMA. BSE adds ₹35 lakh crore in market cap so far in March. Smart surge in mid & small-cap indices. NSE advance-decline ratio at 5:2. Banks, realty, and IT lead the gains. Gas stocks on fire on regulatory boost. Nifty gainers: Kotak Bank, NTPC, Tech Mahindra, SBI. Nifty losers: Titan, IndusInd, Trent, M&M, Airtel. Nifty 500 gainers: JBM Auto, Rajesh Exports, Finolex, Alkyl Amines. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: IIFL Capital Services stock soars 13% amid top management rejig
items.description: Nemkumar H, IIFL Capital Services' Managing Director and member of board, has stepped down to focus exclusively on business development, and is now the designated Chief Growth Officer.

items.description: Geojit Financial Services is bullish on Wonderla Holidays has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 799 in its research report dated March 24, 2025.

items.description: Manappuram Finance recently announced that Bain Capital will be acquiring 18 percent stake in the company with the said amount

items.title: Poonawalla Fincorp shares rise 4% on launching AI-powered underwriting, up 24% in six sessions
items.description: Poonawalla Fincorp's stock is currently one of the top gainers on the Nifty Midcap index, having recovered over 30 percent after hitting a 52-week low on March 4, 2025.

items.title: Small, midcap indices extend gains for a sixth session on continued buying
items.description: The Nifty Midcap 100 index rose over 1.4 percent, crossing the 52,000-mark for the first time in over one month.

items.title: Chart of the Day| MF SIP investors are falling into the market timing trap
items.description: Retail investors tend to panic and exit during market downturns, harming their long-term returns, as they miss out on the best-performing days

items.description: Geojit Financial Services is bullish on Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 196 in its research report dated March 24, 2025.

items.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank shares jump 4%, hit over 3-year high on key leadership changes
items.description: Kotak Mahindra Bank has gained 22 percent so far in 2025, significantly outperforming the Nifty 50

items.title: Titan shares fall 3% on concerns over slowing growth momentum, rich valuations
items.description: Ambit’s channel checks indicate a weaker revenue growth trend for Tanishq in February and March
